events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to request a refund because the product did not meet my expectations.
The issue was labelled under 'Refund' due to the customer's request for a money back related to dissatisfaction.
A customer support agent was assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, may I also know the reason you want to return the product?
The product did not work as described, and I am quite disappointed with its performance. Order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the details. I will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send you instructions on how to return the item.
That sounds good. I appreciate your quick response and the refund arrangement.
Your refund has been processed, and return shipping label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are following up to confirm if you have received the refund and if everything is satisfactory on your end.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
